## What is this?

A complete template to market yourself and your portfolio to the world as a developer

## How can I customize this?

- Edit the index.ts and constant.tsx file.
- Edit the images in the template to your own
- Deploy the template to vercel
- Share the link to your portfolio

## How many sections are there?

This template includes the following sections:

- Hero Section
- Projects Section
- About Section
- Work Section
- Education Section
- Contact Section
- Footer Section
